title: Petersburg National Battlefield: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       January 8, 2015: National Park Service Announces 2015 Fee Free Dates. The next fee free day will be September 26 in recognition of National Public Lands Day.  September 3, 2015: National Park Service launches Every Kid in a Park program to encourage 4th graders and their families to visit and enjoy their parks.  Upcoming Events:   Saturday, September 12: Artillery Demonstrations 1:00 - 4:30 pm - Eastern Front Unit - Tour Stop 3  Saturday, Sept. 12 & Sunday, Sept. 12: Infantry Demonstrations 10:00 am - 4:30 pm on Saturday, 10:00 am - 1:00 pm on Sunday Eastern Front Unit - Tour Stop 3  Saturday, Sept. 19: "Cemeteries in Contrast: The Civil War Burials of Blandford and Poplar Grove" 10:00 am Free 3-hour auto caravan tour begins at the Blandford Cemetery Reception Center, Rochelle Lane, Petersburg  Saturday, September 26: "The Forgotten Fourteen" 10:00 am & 2:00 pm - Eastern Front Visitor Center auditorium
